name: VPN Speed - Unlimited & Fast Security Proxy Master
description: VPN Speed easy to use, just simply click one button you can access the Internet securely, anonymously, and connect to unblock sites.  * Protect your privacy, keep you safe from 3rd party tracking * Works with Wi-Fi, 5G, LTE/4G, 3G and all mobile data carriers * VPN work on all browsers * Unblock geographically restricted websites * No speed limitation * One-click to connecting VPN * No usage and time limit * No registration or configuration required * No additional permissions required * No root access needed * Encrypts your internet traffic * Using most secure VPN solution * 24 hour active VPN service  * Multi VPN servers - vpn for United States - vpn for Germany - vpn for Russia - vpn for Japan  If VPN Speed connect failed, dont worry, you can follow these steps to fix it: 1) Click the flag icon 2) Click the refresh button to check servers 3) Choose the fastest and most stable server to reconnect  For policy reason, this service can not be used in China. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.  The servers here are from VPN GATE and are by the volunteers across the globe. We do not take responsibility for any data breach.
